title: The role of secondary metabolites in the production of CuO nanoparticles by fungi: a physiological and metabolic approach
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00403E, Paper
Ying Zhou, Hang N. Nguyen, Janire Pe√±a-Bahamonde, Francisco C. Robles-Hernandez, Luciana Jandelli Gimenes, Debora F. Rodrigues
Previous studies have found that the production of nanoparticles by various fungi is related to the release of NADPH/NADH into the growth medium.
